summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North and West 76th Street from Woodland Park Avenue to 8th Avenue Northwest; North 77th Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; Dayton Avenue from North 75th Street to North 77th Street; and Fremont Avenue from North 75th Street to North 78th Street; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2103 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
